title: Brick Lane - Shahana's complaints suggest that she

content.question: Shahana’s complaints in “You’ll stink...with you” primarily suggest that she

choices.label: wants to ruin her father’s project
had wanted to eat at a restaurant instead
feels embarrassed by her family’s ways
is angered by her father’s passivity

content.answer: feels embarrassed by her family’s ways

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify and describe what specific textual details reveal about a character, that character's perspective, and that character's motives.
